title: Trying to find a new main for my first/second account.
body: I'm making a second account and planning to only play 1/2 champs. The criteria is that the can 1v9 they can absolutely dominate games, there overall just a fun charcter,  and that they do a lot of dmg, im open to all suggestions so please to give me suggestions, although I am not really interested in adc/support! Thanks in advance. BTW I'm not the best but willing to devote some time into a champ.

replies.body: Ap, ad, on hit affect? What kind of build.
i go full ap teemo in normals, the shrooms destroy people but if you really wanna climb then go tank on hit build

{{champion:74}} 

If you learn to play him and can position around your turrets properly (assuming you can land his e more times than you miss it), it's an easy win in lane phase. You just keep getting stronger as the game goes on, too.
Aviva is pretty strong pretty much all game if you can land her q - e combo early. Hard part is landing the slowest moving stun in the game. Lol. Post level 6, r - e combo is easier
Anivia, Delay games out and oneshot late game
How hard can she hyper carry?
